content:
The Frustrated User: This archetype represents users who experience frustration when interacting with the Cita Previa website. They may feel overwhelmed or stressed by the process, and may fear missing out on an appointment or losing valuable time. They may also feel lack of feedback or empathy from the website, which contributes to their frustration.

The Skeptical User: This archetype represents users who have concerns about the trustworthiness or security of the Cita Previa website. They may fear that the website is a scam or that their personal information is at risk, and may need additional reassurance or evidence of its reliability before they are willing to proceed.

The Overwhelmed User: This archetype represents users who feel overwhelmed by the amount of information and steps required in the appointment booking process. They may struggle to find the information they need or to complete the required forms, leading to feelings of confusion or frustration. This archetype could include older users, users with disabilities, and users who are not tech-savvy. It could also include foreigners who may be unfamiliar with the website or who do not speak Spanish.
